author: bayard
msg: Applying my modified version of Chris Hyzer's patch from LANG-180 - adding a replaceEach(String, String[], String[]) and replaceRepeatedly(String, String[], String[]) pair of methods. The internal code to the private replaceEach method has not been fully reviewed yet - I wanted to get more eyes focused on the algorithm

author: dblevins
msg: We no longer support the "openejb in a single webapp" style integration which that module tests, so there's no real reason for this module to exist.  Maybe resurrected if we can readd that support.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Raj Saini "FreeMaker exception1/ while approving the cutomer reviews created by a PartyGroup user ("https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1602) - OFBIZ-1602
